title: Vote for the launch of TKO Token in the Innovation Zone of ForTube BSC
body:
As a new DeFi product facing the future, ForTube has officially launched a fully upgraded version of ForTube V3. Through asset rating and fund pooling, ForTube V3 has completed the risk isolation of the fund pool in the innovation zones and the stable zones, which avoid the risk of financial contagion to the greatest extent, while alleviating the impact of the failure of the pledged asset system and market fluctuations.

In order to introduce more high-quality assets to the ForTube ecosystem, and provide higher revenue and more flexible value capture opportunities, ForTube will cooperate with more excellent DeFi project and communities.

What is Tokocrypto ？
Tokocrypto was officially launched in September 2018 and became the first entity in Indonesia to be registered under the Commodity Futures Trading Regulatory Agency Indonesia (BAPPEBTI) in November 2019. Tokocrypto's vision is to help Indonesians gain a broader knowledge of the industry and to integrate the technology into the society and subsequently, the global economy. Over the last three years, Tokocrypto has achieved multiple milestones including 30,000+ weekly active traders, $25,000,000 USD daily trading volume, 240,000+ downloads since mobile app launch in October 2020 and a user base of 281,000+ registered users.

ForTube plans to launch TKO in the innovation zone of ForTube BSC. At present, ForTube and Tokocrypto have completed the preliminary communication for the launch details. The key parameters are as follows:

Token: TKO
Network: BSC
Zone: Innovation Zone
Pledge Rate: 60%
Liquidation Line: 70%
Liquidation Reward: 12%
Deposit Limit: 1 Million
Borrow Limit: No Limit

If the vote is approved, ForTube will carry out merged mining activities, the specific parameters are as follows:

Deposit TKO to Earn FOR
Mining Supply Amount: 350,000 FOR
Mining Cycle: 14 days
Starting Time: April 27th, 2021 14:00

Deposit FOR to Earn TKO
Mining Supply Amount: 43103.44 TKO
Mining Cycle: 30 days
Starting Time: April 27th, 2021 14:00

Now, we will submit this proposal to the ForTube community, and users can vote through Snapshot.
Voting Time: April 26th, 2021 6PM - April 27th, 2021 6AM
A. Agree to launch TKO in the ForTube Innovation Zone
B. Disagree to launch TKO in the ForTube Innovation Zone


What is Tokocrypto ？
Tokocrypto was officially launched in September 2018 and became the first entity in Indonesia to be registered under the Commodity Futures Trading Regulatory Agency Indonesia (BAPPEBTI) in November 2019. Tokocrypto's vision is to help Indonesians gain a broader knowledge of the industry and to integrate the technology into the society and subsequently, the global economy. Over the last three years, Tokocrypto has achieved multiple milestones including 30,000+ weekly active traders, $25,000,000 USD daily trading volume, 240,000+ downloads since mobile app launch in October 2020 and a user base of 281,000+ registered users.

关于ForTube BSC版本创新区上线TKO 代币的提案投票
	
作为面向未来的全新DeFi产品，ForTube推出了全面升级的ForTube V3版本。通过资产评级和资金分池，ForTube V3完成了创新区和稳健区资金池的风险隔离，最大程度的规避了金融传染的风险，缓解了质押资产系统失灵及市场波动的影响。
	
为了将更多优质资产引入ForTube生态，为ForTube用户提供更高收益，更加灵活的价值捕获机会，ForTube将与更多优秀的DeFi项目和社区进行合作。



ForTube建议TKO项目上线BSC版创新区。目前，双方已经完成了上线的审慎沟通，关键参数如下：

     币种：TKO
	 网络：BSC
	分区：创新区
	质押率：60%
	清算线：70%
	清算奖励：12%
	存币上限：100万个
	借币上限：不限

如果投票通过，ForTube将开展联合挖矿活动，具体参数如下：

【存TKO挖FOR】
挖矿供应数量:35万FOR
挖矿周期:14天
开始时间：2021年4月27日 14:00
                                                 
【存FOR挖TKO】
挖矿供应数量: 43103.44个TKO
挖矿周期：30天
开始时间：2021年4月27日 14:00

现在将本提案提交ForTube社区，用户可通过Snapshot进行投票。
 投票时间：2021年4月26日18:00—4月27日06:00
A：同意TKO上架ForTube创新区
B：反对TKO 上架ForTube创新区

关于Tokocrypto
Tokocrypto数字资产交易平台是印度尼西亚首个合规的大型数字资产交易平台。Tokocrypto于2018年正式成立，于2019年11月成为印尼第一家在印尼商品期货交易监管机构（BAPPEBTI）注册的实体。Tokocrypto致力于为用户提供简单、易用、快捷、安全且受信任的交易平台，成为印度尼西亚领先的数字资产交易平台。在过去三年中，Tokocrypto已实现多个里程碑，包括自2020年10月推出移动端App以来，每周活跃交易用户超过30,000，每周交易量超过2500万美元，下载量超过240,000，注册量超过281,000。
author: 0xd49524f9FDC4EA8ba65345253C2B9FdE3b6FAF3A
